bibl.title: "I hate all common things": The Reader's Role in Callimachus' Aetia Prologue.
bibl.note: Before starting the literary communication proper, Callimachus makes sure that the medium of contact is working and that he reaches exactly the audience that he wants to reach.
SCHMITZ Thomas A., "I hate all common things": The Reader's Role in Callimachus' Aetia Prologue.
